name: #00025 We will remember them 211109
description: #00025 We will remember them 211109 was produced November 9th 2021, This was part of Remembrance Day activities for the children at nursery, Iris created a picture of some Poppy's with paint and black craft paper to stick down as the center of the poppy, the image really is quite striking in its genuine innocence created by a young child, but resembles such a powerful image of Poppy's almost blood like in creation in remembrance of war. This is NFT number 25 released by the Youngest Artist in the NFT World, Iris. Age at release - 3 years old.
